description:
A pair of costumes for Sophie and Ramizel based on a special costume previously released for "Atelier Sophie: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Book DX".

Note: Costumes can be changed in the "Changing Room" at the desk in the atelier.
Please visit the official website for more information. 
This content can only be downloaded by the users who have purchased "Atelier Sophie 2 Season Pass" or "Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream Ultimate Edition".
name: Sophie/Ramizel's Costumes "Grandma's Outfit (Matching Set)"
